```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath("../"))
library(tidyverse)
```

# Datasets

```{r tracegram}
tracegram_p <- read_csv("./data-raw/tracegram.csv") %>%
  separate(file, c("speaker", "phonation"))
```

```{r wavegram}
wavegram_p <- read_csv("./data-raw/wavegram.csv") %>%
  separate(file, c("speaker", "phonation")) %>%
  mutate(
    sequence_prop = sequence / max(sequence)
  )
```

# Save data

```{r use}
usethis::use_data(tracegram_p, wavegram_p, overwrite = TRUE)
```
